short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Oorwin Plugin allows you to Parse Jobs, Candidates, Add Accounts, Contacts, Submit candidates and many more right from your Email.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OorwinHIRE empowers recruitment team with an intuitive, crisp user experience with functions that combines digital and manpower intelligence to source faster, screen better, and close ideal candidates. Experience OorwinHIRE for free to see how it can gamify your recruitment functions for utilizing the full potential of your team.
